mapper.select: SELECT bc.id, bc.username, bc.comment, bc.resour_key, bc.comment_type, bc.parent_id, bc.root_comment_id, bc.is_deleted, bc.comment_like_count, bc.create_time, bc.images_urls, bu.nickname, bu.avatar FROM b_comment bc left join b_user bu ON bu.username = bc.username WHERE bc.resour_key = #{resourKey} ORDER BY id desc
SELECT id FROM b_comment WHERE username = #{username}
